T02D3287:32a-1: bi ghn'a nta ka s'a dha nam /
T02D3287:32a-3: bgegs mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3287:32a-4: dang por re zhig bde pa'i stan la nye bar
T02D3287:32a-5: gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aam dmar po
T02D3287:32a-6: las des grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi
T02D3287:32a-7: snying gar rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3287:32a-8: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mthing nag rnam par bkod do //
T02D3287:32a-9: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer las byung ba'i bgegs kyi gshed dang /
T02D3287:32b-0: byang chub @32b sems dpa' rnams legs par dmigs la /
T02D3287:32b-1: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing /
T02D3287:32b-3: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D3287:32b-4: stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3287:32b-5: aom stong ba nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nga yin no //
T02D3287:32b-6: de'i rjes la yi ge aam dmar po las byung
T02D3287:32b-7: ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge
T02D3287:32b-8: h'um ngo // de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3287:32b-9: rdo rje yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3287:32b-10: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i de
T02D3287:32b-11: bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad rigs par bzhugs pa
T02D3287:32b-12: sngon du 'gro ba'i de dag thams cad yongs su
T02D3287:32b-13: gyur pa las bgegs mthar byed du bdag nyid rnam
T02D3287:32b-15: sku mdog mthing nag g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3287:32b-16: g-yon pa'i phyag ni sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags
T02D3287:32b-17: pa g-yas pa'i phyag ni rdo rje gdeng pa dang
T02D3287:32b-18: / 'jigs su rung ba dang skra kham ser gyen du phyogs par ro //
T02D3287:32b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i
T02D3287:32b-20: dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa
T02D3287:32b-21: las yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo
T02D3287:32b-22: rje'o // de lta bur gyur pa'i bgegs rnams kyi
T02D3287:32b-23: gshed po sku spro ba dang bsdu ba dang ldan
T02D3287:32b-24: pa padma 'dab ma sna tshogs pa'i steng na nyi
T02D3287:32b-26: dam tshig la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3287:32b-27: de dag rnams thun tshod gnyis dang /
T02D3287:32b-28: gsum du bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02D3287:32b-30: bgegs mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs so //
